name: A. Eugeny and Array
statement:
Eugeny has array , consisting of integers. Each integer equals to -1, or
to 1. Also, he has queries: Query number is given as a pair of integers
, . The response to the query will be integer , if the elements of array
can be rearranged so as the sum , otherwise the response to the query
will be integer . Help Eugeny, answer all his queries.
editorial: If the length of the given segment is even and count of 1 in input is not lower then half of the length of the segment and count of -1 in the input is not lower then half of the length of the segment so we have answer 1, otherwise 0.
